original_text: And the army of the Chaldees pursued after the king, and overtook him in the plains of Jericho: and all his army were scattered from him.
korean_text: 갈대아 군대가 그 왕을 뒤쫓아가서 여리고 평지에서 그를 따라 잡으매 왕의 모든 군대가 그를 떠나 흩어진지라

sentences.original_text: And the army of the Chaldees pursued after the king
and overtook him in the plains of Jericho
and all his army were scattered from him
